snippet: The green vehicles may not make pickups in much of Manhattan but are seen as a boon to riders elsewhere in the city, where yellow cabs may be scarce.
abstract: New York City welcomes first all-borough taxis, green cabs that are allowed to pick up passengers in Upper Manhattan and in outer boroughs; car services have been picking up passengers illegally for years, but June court decision legalized them as part of Bloomberg administration's plan to expand hail service.
lead_paragraph: The green vehicles may not make pickups in much of Manhattan but are seen as a boon to riders elsewhere in the city, where yellow cabs may be scarce.

headline.main: All-Borough Taxis (Like Yellow Cabs, but Green) Hit the Streets
headline.print_headline: All-Borough Taxis (Like Yellow Cabs, but Green) Hit the Streets
